data.text: @K9great84 @MMitaynes We would love to support the Boro Park community as we access additional PPE supplies and will aim to coordinate another distribution soon!

@MMitaynes @AMPHS_NYC Please consider the same  action  BORO PARK being ( BRIZZZI PLAY GROUND ) 43st & NEWUTRECHT AVE ! We have a lot is low income families I’m sure would benefit from your generosity . @MMitaynes
@MMitaynes Thank you for your continued support and being a true representative for the people!
Thank you, Academy of Medical & Public Health Services @AMPHS_NYC for the opportunity to collaborate together on this important community event.❤️ https://t.co/5wBdFLUR6y

Together, we were able to provide over 250 individuals with 150 hand refillable hand sanitizers, 500 test kits, 2000+ KN95 masks and disposable gloves.

This was a wonderful opportunity to serve so many of our working-class neighbors. 🧵 https://t.co/a8KJb5zKyT
